turkish_example_sentence: Ben o zor matematik problemini düşünmüşsem, çözümü bulabilirdim.
english_example_sentence: If I had thought about that difficult math problem, I could have found the solution.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я подумал об этой сложной математической задаче, я бы нашел решение.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Ben o zor matematik problemini ______, çözümü bulabilirdim.
